mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FL_WORKFLOW ( WORKFLOW_ID, WORKFLOW_NAME, VARIABLE, WORKFLOW_XML, DESIGNER_XML, CREATE_DT, STATUS, TREE_ID, USERNAME ) VALUES ( #{workflowId}, #{workflowName}, #{variable}, #{workflowXml}, #{designerXml}, #{create}, #{status}, #{treeId}, #{username} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId, WORKFLOW_NAME as workflowName, VARIABLE as variable, WORKFLOW_XML as workflowXml, DESIGNER_XML as designerXml, CREATE_DT as createDate, STATUS as status, TREE_ID as treeId, USERNAME as username FROM FL_WORKFLOW WHERE TREE_ID = #{value}

SELECT ID as id, WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId, WORKFLOW_NAME as workflowName, VARIABLE as variable, WORKFLOW_XML as workflowXml, DESIGNER_XML as designerXml, CREATE_DT as createDate, STATUS as status, TREE_ID as treeId, USERNAME as username FROM FL_WORKFLOW ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ID as id, WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId, WORKFLOW_NAME as workflowName, VARIABLE as variable, WORKFLOW_XML as workflowXml, DESIGNER_XML as designerXml, CREATE_DT as createDate, STATUS as status, TREE_ID as treeId, USERNAME as username FROM FL_WORKFLOW
mapper.update: UPDATE FL_WORKFLOW SET WORKFLOW_ID = #{workflowId}, WORKFLOW_NAME = #{workflowName}, VARIABLE = #{variable}, WORKFLOW_XML = #{workflowXml}, DESIGNER_XML = #{designerXml}, CREATE_DT = now(), STATUS = #{status}, TREE_ID = #{treeId}, USERNAME = #{username} WHERE TREE_ID = #{treeId}
